title: Chilled tomato soup with Parmesan ice cream
ingredients: ['18 plum tomatoes, chopped', '6 leaves fresh basil, julienned', '2 to 8 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, or as needed', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '50g (2 oz) freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '4 tablespoons double cream']
